item.title: Let's Have Some Fun! Team Testing
item.description: “Testing is something that we do with the motivation of finding new information.” – Michael Bolton[1] Damn old picture of team testing When we talk about team testing, I guess many of you will image a picture in your mind: People are sitting around a table. Everyone gets a paper in front of them. This paper could be a checklist full of test steps, could be a sheet full of test scenarios…
